website_summaries.verdict: This 3-in-one serum brightens dull skin, hydrating and resurfacing while you sleep.
pros: There’s a pleasant tingle on application as the hyaluronic acid, willow bark, and organic honey works to diminish fine lines and shrink pores
It even helps reduce acne scars and dark spots

customer_reviews.title: Skin Changed Overnight!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I saw a girl recommend it on Tik Tok of all places. I put it on by itself last night after I washed my face. I had no burning or tingling sensation like a lot of people mention. I woke up this morning with all of my little bumps reduced by almost 90%! I was shocked! My entire skin texture changed overnight! This will definitely be a holy grail product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Burn
customer_reviews.text: I got this product initially through BoxyCharm and did not use it right away. However, one day after my evening shower I applied it and instantly felt a slight tingle, burning sensation. The next morning my face was a lot smoother and brighter. I was also using Palmer's Fade Cream and it seems as though it ( after about 2 weeks) allowed the blemishes to fade a whole lot faster than the usual period (6-8 weeks). I highly recommend this product if your skin is not very sensitive and you're able to handle mild discomfort to achieve better results. I'm on my third bottle so it's definitely worth it on my end.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Miracle potion!
customer_reviews.text: Omg...I'm so over the moon with this product! My face is a lot even and smoother like a baby's skin seriously!!! I feel so much better with my glowy skin. It helped get rid of my stubborn acne patches and skin texture. I love the product and it works wonders, but I'm not a fan of fragrance. I'm always buying unscented skincare products. The fragrance of this product is not strong but hints of floral. I still will be buying it again anyway! Try it and it'll help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lane

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEE! Cleared up hormonal acne
customer_reviews.text: This product has made such a huge change in my skin, it’s cleared up all kinds of bumps and little breakouts on my chin. I started with applying every other night and it did sting the first couple times but now I use it almost every night and it doesn’t dry me out at all. I’ve got normal/combo skin and use it with the Clinique moisture surge gel as my moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: TheCrayCrafter

customer_reviews.title: Glow! I do see.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product so far. Use 3 times per week as listed on label. My skin does glow after using. Has a tingle on my face after applying. So if you have very sensitive skin keep this in mind. Like the feel of this product on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Noticeable Difference
customer_reviews.text: This will DEFINITELY clear up any blemishes on your face. The scent does have traces of ‘chemical’ but it is a chemical exfoliant, so it is to be expected. VERY PRICEY, so only buy if you’d like to see a difference for effected skin. Style is super cute, and it does moisturize, but I would not use more than 3x a week!
customer_reviews.author: Julian Showalter

customer_reviews.title: Improved my skin SO MUCH!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this this for almost two months and I have noticed a difference in my skin. It does what it says people, the texture of my skin has evened out a bit and it is more smooth especially around my nose which was my main concern. The price does hurt but it is worth it, you only need 1-2 pumps and you are not suppose to use it every night. WARNING IT DOES STING, that is because it is an acid but after the first time the sting was not there any more. I am so thankful for this product and will forever be apart of me skin routine, my skin is smooth as butter.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia Wells

customer_reviews.title: Product works but beware
customer_reviews.text: This product is great in actually doing what it is supposed to do. It is easy to use and doesn't require you to be any specialist to get the nice glow you want. The only downside is it does have a chemical burn feeling. I didn't break out of anything but you could definitely feel the burn. Given the price and the effect, I would say it is worth it, but if you have sensitive skin I would be weary.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Burns but Works
customer_reviews.text: The product smells pretty terrible and burns quite a bit at first use. Fortunately, the smell does dissipate and my skin can tolerate the burn. The outcome is awesome. My skin is looking better each week with consistent use every other day use and my skin doesn't burn as much as it used to. If you can tolerate a bad smell (that doesn't last) and your skin isn't sensitive, then I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Leon

customer_reviews.title: It may seem pricey but it’s trillion investment in your skin
customer_reviews.text: As I’m 24 with a candy addiction in a very stressful job I have the pleasure of dealing with both fear of acne and wrinkles and this product takes care of it all well somehow making my skin look like it has an Instagram filter on all the time. If you’re thinking about getting it do it so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this product. It doesn’t smell great, but my face feels really soft in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Simply, an amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: It has very little smell and is non-greasy. It slightly tingles my skin so I was worried I would have a reaction as I have combination sensitive skin, but nope! It's just doing it's thing tightening my pores. Worth every cent, and will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: CSA

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this product (I was skeptical) but I went ahead and ordered it. After just the first night I woke up to hydrated glowing skin! It goes on perfectly, not greasy at all, and feels amazing! I've already recommended this to all my friends and family and will be ordering other Farmacy products ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: I use it at night. Helps maintain a healthy, glowing complexion. It’s become my go to night skin regimen. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie J Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Best of AHA/BHA
customer_reviews.text: This serum lasts me approx. 1.5 months and it is a game changer. It has both AHA/BHA properties and it gives my face a glow every morning. Started out using it once every 2-3 nights them gradually worked toward every night. This is a potent mix so it burned a little at first but this feeling is minimal and is no longer present after the first week. Definitely wear SPF since this serum has to do with cell turnover.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Campos

customer_reviews.title: allergic reaction!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice now and every time I use it I get a crazy allergic reaction and small red bumps that cover my face!
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: very good product for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's awesome. I bought it to supplement my skincare routine at night. It smooths the skin without irritation. Leaves a nice glow in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Honeymoon glow!
customer_reviews.text: I am 62 years old and wake up looking like a new bride!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Baksa

customer_reviews.title: Skin texture
customer_reviews.text: Left my Skin feeling smooth and silky. The scent for some reason is so soothing. I definitely will be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Helena Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Light and rejuvenating!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is light and refreshing on my skin. It makes me feel rejuvenated when I apply. Obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Mom

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Package was professional, this beats buying the half used one I initially got from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. My skin immediately looked better after one use. Can’t wait to see the improvement after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hallier

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! This is my second bottle. I got my first bottle in an Ipsy box. I use it twice a week. It makes my skin glow. The product does sting when you first start using it. That gets better with time.
customer_reviews.author: SSJ

customer_reviews.title: This does not burn or peel or hurt in any way.  It's tremendous.
customer_reviews.text: Luv this company and this product. Awesome!!! Works beautifully and does NOT burn at all. Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaynie Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Feels good on the skin and my skin is softer.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tal

customer_reviews.title: This is magic potion!
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable difference within one use. In my opinion, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Leaking packaging
customer_reviews.text: There was no seal on the packaging and it was leaking. Also it didn’t come with a pump
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says and more
customer_reviews.text: I am beginning to show age spots, so I thought I would give this a try. Boy, am I glad I did! I use it every night before I go to bed. Not only are the age spots fading quickly, but so are old acne scars I have had for years. This stuff works! I don't have any irritation at all. My fine lines are disappearing as well! Definitely a must have product! My skin hasn't looked this good in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummer...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for two weeks and don’t see any difference in my skin aside from a few blemishes that I don’t usually experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample from Sephora and you can feel the burn at the beginning but it shows it does the magic. Will update after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Tunia

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at Sephora
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff! I have VERY sensitive skin. I’ve never had any issues. It honestly does make your face clear up and “glow.” Buy elsewhere....Sephora is less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany David

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample and was so impressed I bought a bottle! It works. You can feel it working.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Deike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ✨✨
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I’ve tried Glow Recipe Watermelon sleep mask worn AHA and Honeymoon glow blows it out of the water! I love this stuff. And you only need one pump to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

product_meta.title: Farmacy Honeymoon Glow AHA Hydrating Night Serum w/Hyaluronic Acid for Fine Lines & Wrinkles
feature_bullets: THE FARMACY WAY: Our goal is simple. We want to bring out the best version of your radiant self with the best possible, naturally derived ingredients. Each women's skincare and beauty product we craft uses cutting-edge science to harness the healing powers of ingredients that Mother Nature has been so kind as to provide for us.
BEAUTY SLEEP: The AHA face serum uses a 14% AHA / BHA / gentle flower acids blend to resurface, hydrate and clarify dull skin, all while you're fast asleep!
YOUTHFUL COMPLEXION: The anti aging serum's AHA blend also helps to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal a healthy, more youthful complexion and a natural glow.

PROVEN RESULTS: Based on a consumer panel test of women ages 25-60 with a variety of skin types, in just six weeks, 100% of users felt skin was soft and supple, and 97% of users felt skin was smooth and retexturized.

HOW TO USE: Apply a generous layer of the face treatment (1–2 pumps) to clean skin at night, avoiding eyes and lips. Use 2–3 times a week. May build up to more frequent use. Slight tingling may be experienced.
